tone: Close journey replies asking customers to text in their birthday to receive a gift
dos_and_donts: Offer help if the customer replies back to the automated message with number 0
templates: For checkout issues use COI shortcut
If the site doesn't accept the customers payment method use PME shortcut
promo_and_exclusions: The welcome code can be applied to discounted items
For issues with the code GETSTARTED15 use GSE shortcut
The 20% off welcome offer will automatically be added at checkout for their first order

162.AgentMessage1: Talentless: Hi, thanks for reaching out! How can I help?
162.customerMessage2: Hi, I ordered the six men's premium tees on January 8th and paid for shipping that was 3-4 business days. However it says it's not arriving until the 21st but I am going out of town the 19th and need the shirts by then. How can it get to me by then or can I get refunded for the order and place a new order using express checkout to get the shirts in time. Thanks
162.customerMessage3: I would also like to speak to a representative on the phone.
162.AgentMessage2:
Talentless: I'm truly sorry about that. Are you referring to Order #704739? If so, upon checking, it has a standard shipping method. Our processing time takes 3-5 business days, and we usually ship via USPS, UPS, FedEx, or DHL. Once shipped, it will take 2-8 business days for domestic orders. Since the package is already with the courier, the most effective next step would be to reach out to them directly, as they typically have the most up-to-date tracking details. Have you had a chance to give them a call yet? They may be able to provide more insight or information. 

This number is for SMS only, so I'm not able to make or receive calls. You can give us a call at 1-562-296-1808.
162.customerMessage4: Yes, I am referring to that order. Is it too late to cancel and get fully refunded. Also, if I place a new order and get express delivery, how long will that take to get delivered? Thanks again
162.AgentMessage3: Talentless: As the order has shipped already we are not able to cancel it, however, you can return it for a refund. If you took express shipping it takes 1-2 days for shipping, but processing can still take 3-5 days if we are very busy. I hope this helps!

165.customerMessage1: Hi Jordan- thanks for looking out. I intended to call the company. I went to check out and I'm not getting my loyalty discount??? It's supposed to automatically applied at checkout???

Please note that Sam Edelman Loyalty members receive their discounts when logged in, and the discount needs to be manually applied at checkout. In the meantime, I'd be happy to check with my team and will keep you posted.
165.customerMessage3: I was logged in. How do I get the code to manually enter the discount?

165.AgentMessage3: Sam Edelman: Thanks for all the info. I will be back with more details soon.
